summary: Four friends growing up in Oslo in the sixties, who occasionally think of themselves as the Fab Four. Based on the best selling book by Lars Saabye Christensen.
cast: Louis Williams|Håvard Jackwitz|Halvor Tangen Schultz|Ole Nicolai Myrvold Jørgensen|Susanne Boucher|Marit Andreassen|Øystein Røger|Peter Gantzler|Gard B. keywords: friendship|teenage boy|friendship between boys|based on novel
title: Beatles
